description: Streetbrew Games brings you Minebrew: * Features the complete Streetbrew client * Enjoy classic minesweeper in a social setting! The premise: A nefarious organization has littered a small town with explosive devices! The evacuation is well under way, but the bomb squad has yet to arrive at the scene. Equipped only with a primitive bomb detector and your own wits, you've been tasked with marking the bombs so they can be avoided by the escaping townsfolk... Complete puzzles of various difficulties and post your winning times to the places you visit. Send your scores to Facebook and Twitter so your friends can see where you're playing and how you're faring. Players may infuse their minebrew with shots of frustresso to increase the level of difficulty. The difficulty ranges from a 10x10 board with 20 mines, to a 20x20 board with 80 mines. The harder the puzzle, the more points you score when you play at a wall. Note: Tap and hold a square to drop a flag. Tap the gray button to zoom out and see how you're doing. To learn more, visit us on the web at Streetbrew.com.
